name: Free Immigration Clinics
description: Eligible legal permanent residents can get help completing their naturalization applications. During these virtual clinics, trained volunteers assist clients under the supervision of IIBA legal staff. IIBA provides free representation to clinic participants and will review and file completed naturalization applications.

howToGetIt: If you're interested in attending an upcoming citizenship clinic, contact one of the 7 local IIBA offices. San Francisco 58 2nd Street, 3rd Floor, San Francisco, CA 94105 (415) 538-8100 ext. 206 sfinfo@iibayarea.org Redwood City 600 Allerton Street, Suite 101, Redwood City, CA 94063 (650) 780-7530 redwoodcity@iibayarea.org Oakland 476 3rd Street, Oakland, CA 94607 (510) 451-2846 ext. 301 oakland@iibayarea.org or book an initial consultation: https://www5.apptoto.com/b/oaklandlegalconsults/ Brentwood 201 Sand Creek Road, Suite L, Brentwood, CA 94513 (925) 237-8581 ext. 11 brentwood@iibayarea.org or book an initial consultation: https://www5.apptoto.com/b/brentwoodconsults/ Fremont 39055 Hastings St, Suite 202, Fremont, CA 94538 (510) 894-3639 fremont@iibayarea.org or book an initial consultation: https://www5.apptoto.com/b/fremontconsultation/type Napa 1785 3rd Street, Napa, CA 94559 (707) 266-1568 ext. 401 napainfo@iibayarea.org or book an initial consultation: https://www5.apptoto.com/b/napalegalservices/type Petaluma: 5401 Old Redwood Hwy, Suite 104, Petaluma, CA 94954 (707) 932-7000 petaluma@iibayarea.org or book an initial consultation: https://www5.apptoto.com/b/petaluma_legal_services/
